Where is the relic? Perchance you forgot to bring it?
Please ensure that the relic you wish to have soulglazed is either equipped, in your Armoury Chest, or in your inventory before speaking with Jalzahn.

Hm, it appears that this relic has already been soulglazed. The rest is up to you, my friend. With your weapon in hand, do that which you do best: adventure. In due course, the spirit energy it bears shall become fully attuned.
Completing certain activities while equipped with your soulglazed relic weapon will increase its soul attunement level.
By using the Zodiac glass, it is possible to visually verify attunement progress.
Once your relic weapon novus has achieved full soul attunement, you may present it to Jalzahn to have it upgraded to a relic weapon nexus.
Without further ado, I shall apply soulglaze to your weapon. Not a spot shall be left uncoated.
...Yes, that should do it. The relic is now completely aethertight.

Completing certain activities while equipped with your soulglazed relic weapon will increase its soul attunement level.
By using the Zodiac glass, it is possible to visually verify attunement progress.
Once your relic weapon novus has achieved full soul attunement, you may present it to Jalzahn to have it enhanced to a relic weapon nexus.
The upgraded weapon will retain the power it received from materia by way of the sphere scroll.
It is possible to alter the materia-enhanced properties of your relic, both before and after the aforementioned upgrade. To initiate the process, please speak with Jalzahn.
